lawName: Construction allowed in areas of high and very high fire risk
Minimum buffer zone for construction near forested land
Minimum buffer zone for construction near agricultural land (moderate fire risk)
Minimum buffer zone for construction near agricultural land (low fire risk)
Minimum buffer zone for construction near agricultural land (very low fire risk)
Protective buffer zone measured from exterior wall
Containment measures for potential ignition sources
Positive opinion from the Municipal Commission of Forest Defense (CMDF)
Inclusion of primary or secondary network infrastructure in protection buffer calculation
